content: /tprabhaathatthinte srashdaavum, andhakaaratthe maayichukallanyu srshdikallkku prakaasham nalki santoshippikkunnavanumaaya kartthaave! Nyangallil paripaakathayulllla nadapadikall srshdich, paapaandhakaaratthe nyangallilninnu poornnamaayi neekkikkallayename. Nyangallude kartthaavum nithya daivavume! Ninte krpayude mahaneeyakiranangallaal nyangalle prashobhippichu santoshippikkukayum cheyyaname.
Karunayulllla daivame! Ninte karunayaal nyangallodu karuna cheyyaname.

Ninmeyu rakthangall nyangallkkachaaram
Thannathinaal naathhaa! Vidhiyetteedaruthe

Neethiyezhum nyaayaa-dheeshaa! Krpa cheyka
Kadamellaam ninvan-kanivaal neekkenam

Kartthaave! Ninte sharane mrtharaayu nin
Varavinu kaattheedum mrtharil kaniyaname

Sthuthyan maathaavin smrthi valuthaakkunnon
Shuddhare maanippon-mrthareyuyarppippon

Pethgomo-aashcharyam mrtharilaho nee kaattunnu haale......
Vishvaasiniyaam sabha mrthare-yorkkunnundar-
Ppithamaayi dhoopatthaalum-kahanenmaar vazhiyum
Sabhayil thaathan thanshlommo-vaazhatte, dushdan vee-
Zhatte vaazhtthatte-makkall jeevadane.

Sthuthyan maartthaamariyaam than-sodaranaakum
Lovosaar cheenyennaalum-jeevan kalppichaan
nee chennappoll yaayeeros-sutha jeevichaall
Mrtharantyatthil jeevikkum-ninnaahvaanatthaal.

Mashiyum thoovalumenye shlo-mmo nirayum ka-
Tthodugabriyel mariyaami-nnarike chennetthi
Chonnaan shlomo ninnodu koo-dundudayon
Ninnilninnudayam cheythidumi-lokam rakshippaan.

Kanye! Parishuddhe! Saakshaal-paarayathaam
Daivasuthan ninniludichaan-paulosin vachanam pol
Nadiye maruvilozhukkiyoraa-paarayaho
Paavanayaam nin saadrshyatthe-vishadam varnnichu.

Pantrandaakum shleehanmaar-thal praarththhanayaal
Pantrandaakum maasangalle vaazhttheeduka naathhaa!
Mazhayum varavum pathivinu vanneedatte nalkatte
naathhan nanmakallum bhuvanam villavukallum.

Ellaarum snehicheedumee-nashvara loka-zttheyentinu sahadenmaare!-ningall nirasichu
Snehichoreyaadyantam-thalllliya loka-
Tthin vyaamoham mithhyayathe nnee nyangall kandoo.

Paapam cheythen dharayekkaall-kopippichen
Ninne bhoomiyilengumezhum-dhrshdanmaarekkaall
Aayussayyo kurayunnu-mrthiyaasannam
cheyyum nyaanentante kadam-krpayaal pokkaname.

Paapam cheythaar vidhinilaye-vilapikkum
Nadapadikall sooryanu sannibhamaay-parishodhicheedum
Nyaayaadheeshan nishkarunam-theerppudane
Kalpikkum, mukhapakshavumavide-kaikkooliyumilla.

Chaathuryatthodu bhuvanatthe-marananukatthil
Bandhichoruvijnyan srshdaavunnatharaavum
nrpare padavikallil ninnum-bheekararaakum
vidhikartthaakkalle bharanatthil ninnum neekkunnu.

Thrppaavanathanuvoduyirin rudhiravume-
ttoru vishvaasikall mrtharetteedumee-dhoopatthaal punyam
jeevapradanaam mashihaa nin-daivikamaam
valabhaagatthavar nilakondange-sthuthi paadeedatte.

Pethgomo-naathhannishdam niravettum shushrooshakasamgham
Kartthaavin muntirivillayil
Panicheythorevam chonneedum
Muzhupakaladdhvaanichoraam
Nyangallkkekuka prathidaanam
vaagdattham pol koolitharaam.
/tuththhaanadine savishesham
/tmukhakaantiyumekaa-
/tmennudayonuttharamarulli.

Paathaallamananyaamrthiye ve-
Nnoraadyathanoojaa! Sthothram.
Avanekkandaashvaasattho-
Daadaam vandichura cheythaan
enpaapam maayichishaa!
/tnyaan sutharotthu puratthaayo-
/traaparudeesayile-
/tykkenne madakkiyayaykkaname.

Theejvaala pillarnnagnimayan
Theekkanalumethichoyaar keeri
thaanuparannaanasretthil
Chennothi mariyaamodaayu
Dhanye! Shlomo ninkoode
/tundudayon ninnudaraphalam
/taadaam vargatthin
/tnindaye nishshesham neekkum.

Paavanakanyakamariyaamin
Praarththhana yaachanayennivayaale
Shikshakalle rodhikkaname
nyangallil ninnum daivasuthaa
aanandeshvaryangallezhum
/t maasaabdangall nalkaname
/t nyangade praarththhanayil
/t preethi ninakkundaakaname

Varuvin! Mashihaathan priyaraam-
Shleehareyabhayam praapicheedaam
avar vimalaathmaavodoppam
vaanoozhitthaakkol nedi
bhoomiyilavare vishrutharaam
/tvaagmikallaakkiyavan dhanyan
/tinneelokatthil
/t paaram shreshdham thal smarana.

Chollunnevam sahadenmaar
nyangade naathhan melsvargatthil
aayiravum pathinaayiravum-
Vaanor munpil nilkkunnu
Thalsathyam vediyaatthoraam
/tnyangallkkillanyan naathhan
/trakshicheedumavan-marddithare marddakareennum.

Veerabhadan thommaashleehaa!
Parishuddhaa! Nin poraattatthe
Niravetti shreshdhakireedam
Nirmmichon vaazhtthappetton
Vaanuzhikallipperunnaallil
/tkeertthikkunnu saamodam
/tthaathasoothanmaare
/tpaavanaruhaayodoppam

Karunaavaathil thurakkaname
nyaan ninnodum svargatthodum
pizha cheyyen nin suthanenna
perinenikkarhathayilla
anpudayone! Nyaaniniyum
/tdaasan maappekidana
/t thaapam poonda suthan
/t thaathanodevam yaachichu

Nammude kaalam nammeppol
itthalamurayum nammoduthulyam
dhanavaanmaarathyaagrahikall
paavangallkku rasam vyaajatthil
svasnehithane vizhungunnu
/t paampennonam marthyanmaar
/t thammil kavarunnu
/t daivika neethiyavarkkilla.

Shreeyuththhaanatthinneki
sharanam jeevippinnettiyavan
sampoojyan paulosothu-
Sthhiranaayonodevam
Bhoshaa! Dhaanyam vitha cheythaal
/tvallaraakedenye mahimaa
/tvodaadaamyakulam
/tjeevichidumennariyichaan.

Naathhaa! Ninmeykthangall
Kaikkollllukayaal punyam poonda
Vaangippoyorkkekaname
meloorishalemil sarana
Shishdare dushdajanatthinnum
/tveraakkumpollavarettam
/tmukhathejassodu nin
/t valabhaagatthaayu nilkkaname

Than kaippaniyaamaadatthe
daivamirunnu nireekshichu
thoppil parudeesinnullllil
srashdaavodu samanaam srshdi
vrkshangallkkidayil sai്varyam
viharikkunnathu veekshichaan
mannin mahimaavil-vismayamirenmaa-raarnnu.

Poorvvaachaaryathvam praapichaharon
Moshayodonnichu
Skariyaaykkathu nalki mosha
skkariyaa yohannaaneki
Yohannaan kartthaavinnum
Kartthaathan shleehanmaarkkum
Naanaasrshdivibhaagangallkkeki shleehanmaar.

Aachaaryanmaarkkaashvaasam nalkenam naathhaa!
Siddhanmaarodoppam nithyavaasam thannil

Kaatthidenam shushrooshakare varanaam mshihaa!
Kabaril kezhunnaachaaryanmaarkkunarvekenam
maathrayil maayum maayayilavaraanandichilla
nin snehatthaal peedhakallettorkkekuka nanma

nashvaramaakum vyamohatthe paade vittor
Kkaashvaasam nee nalkeedaname shobhanagehe
Thaarunyatthin makudamupekshichaagrahamenye
Thaane krooshettinam kondaar thirunaamatthil.

Aasha kedutthum vachanam kellppaanidayaakalle
Ninneyettoreyanpaal neeyettidenam.

/Tkartthaave! Ninne sthothram cheyyunnathum / unnathamaaya ninte naamatthinu sthuthipaadunnathum / prabhaatha samayatthu ninte krpayeyum / raathrikaalangallil ninte vishvaasattheyum ariyi kkunnathum ethra nallathaakunnu / kartthaave! Prabhaatha samayatthu ente shabdam nee kellkkename.

/tprabhaatha samayatthu nyaan orukkatthode ninakku kaana ppedumaaraakaname / kartthaave! Ninte janangallodu karuna cheyyaname / kartthaave! Nyangallellaavarudeyum paapangall pariharichu kshamikkename / parishuddhanaayullllaave! / Ninte valathukai nyangalludemel aashvasippichu / thirunaamam nimittham nyangallude paaparogatthil ninnu / nyangalle sukhappedutthaname.
